scripts.build: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --compile --outfile dist/ccmemory --external @tailwindcss/postcss --external postcss --external autoprefixer --external lightningcss
scripts.build:js: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target bun
scripts.build:linux: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/ccmemory-linux-x64 --external @tailwindcss/postcss --external postcss --external autoprefixer --external lightningcss
scripts.build:macos: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/ccmemory-darwin-x64 --external @tailwindcss/postcss --external postcss --external autoprefixer --external lightningcss
scripts.build:macos-arm: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/ccmemory-darwin-arm64 --external @tailwindcss/postcss --external postcss --external autoprefixer --external lightningcss
scripts.build:windows: bun run prebuild:webui && bun build src/main.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/ccmemory-windows-x64.exe --external @tailwindcss/postcss --external postcss --external autoprefixer --external lightningcss
scripts.build:all-platforms: bun run build:linux && bun run build:macos && bun run build:macos-arm && bun run build:windows
scripts.db:counts: sqlite3 ~/.local/share/ccmemory/memories.db 'SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memories) as memories, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memory_vectors) as vectors, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as docs'
